attributes.action: Student Travelcard Should Not Be Higher Priced Than Jobcentre Plus Travelcard
attributes.additional_details: Why does a person on Jobcentre Plus get a monthly London zones 1-6 travelcard for £102.60 a month, and a student gets the same travelcard for £143.30. That works out that students are once again being charged a premium of £488.40 per year. This should be at least equal, students should not be charged extra..
